Summary Note:
The RM first met Scholz Schneider at a luxury car show in Berlin. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Having worked for over 32 years, Scholz Schneider brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Scholz Schneider and Frieda have been married since 1998. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Scholz graduated from Schiller-Gymnasium Berlin in 1987.
Scholz completed his university studies at Technical University of Munich in 1993.
Occupation History:
Scholz Schneider is a seasoned professional with over 32 years of experience.
Scholz Schneider's first role was as a Aerospace Engineer at RUAG Aerospace Services GmbH, where he worked diligently from 1993 to 1994 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1995, he moved to Airbus Operations GmbH to work as a Program Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
He spent 4 years working as a Director of Operations at Liebherr-Aerospace GmbH, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He appointment as a VP of Business Development at MTU Aero Engines AG in 2001 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1490000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He is willing to take calculated risks in pursuit of higher returns.
He has townhouse located in Bielefeld, worth 1450000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 310000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Real Estate Developer, in 2015.
Client Summary: In summary, Scholz has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
